histogram.name: GCM.AccountMappingMessageReceived
histogram.summary: Records that a message has been received from a delivery channel powered by the GCM account mappings.

histogram.name: GCM.CheckinRequestStatus
histogram.summary: Status code of the outcome of a GCM checkin request.

histogram.name: GCM.CheckinRequestStatusNetError
histogram.summary: Network error code for a GCM checkin request that failed because of a network error.

histogram.name: GCM.ConnectionDisconnectErrorCode
histogram.summary: URL response and error codes from GCM disconnect events.

histogram.name: GCM.ConnectionEndpoint
histogram.summary: Number of connections made to each specific MCS endpoint.

histogram.name: GCM.ConnectionFailureErrorCode
histogram.summary: URL response and error codes from GCM connection attempts.

histogram.name: GCM.ConnectionLatency
histogram.summary: The time between the initiation of a connection and the successful completion of it.

histogram.name: GCM.ConnectionResetReason
histogram.summary: Reasons for GCM connection resets.

histogram.name: GCM.ConnectionSuccessRate
histogram.summary: GCM connection success rate. Does not take into account login success. See GCM.ConnectionFailureErrorCode for a breakdown of connection failure reasons.

histogram.name: GCM.ConnectionUpTime
histogram.summary: Time (from login until reset) that a GCM connection was active.

histogram.name: GCM.Crypto.CreateKeySuccessRate
histogram.summary: Success rate of writing new keying material to the GCM key store.

histogram.name: GCM.Crypto.DecryptMessageResult
histogram.summary: Result of decryption on a received GCM message, which includes unencrypted messages, successfully decrypted messages and decryption failures.

histogram.name: GCM.Crypto.EncryptMessageResult
histogram.summary: Result of encryption of outgoing GCM message, which includes successfully encrypted messages and encryption failures.

histogram.name: GCM.Crypto.GCMDatabaseUpgradeResult
histogram.summary: Result of upgrading GCM Key Store Database from deprecated format to current format. We upgrade the GCM Key store when it first initialized, if it contains any EncryptionData object with a KeyPair in it, and then record whether the upgrade was successful in this metric.

histogram.name: GCM.Crypto.GetKeySuccessRate
histogram.summary: Success rate of reading keying material from the GCM key store.

histogram.name: GCM.Crypto.InitKeyStoreSuccessRate
histogram.summary: Success rate of initializing the LevelDB back-end of the GCM key store.

histogram.name: GCM.Crypto.LoadKeyStoreSuccessRate
histogram.summary: Success rate of loading existing keying material in the GCM key store.

histogram.name: GCM.Crypto.RemoveKeySuccessRate
histogram.summary: Success rate of removing keying material from the GCM key store.

histogram.name: GCM.Database.Open
histogram.summary: The result of a database open attempt by the GCM store.

histogram.name: GCM.DataMessageReceived
histogram.summary: Number of DATA_MESSAGE messages received from Google Cloud Messaging for which a matching registration exists. Recorded when processing the received message. Prior to M56 this also counted received DELETED_MESSAGES messages (whether or not a registration existed).

histogram.name: GCM.DataMessageReceivedHasCollapseKey
histogram.summary: Records whether a non-empty collapse_key token is set for each received DATA_MESSAGE message from Google Cloud Messaging for which a matching registration exists. Recorded while processing the received message.

histogram.name: GCM.DeletedMessagesReceived
histogram.summary: For every DELETED_MESSAGES message received from Google Cloud Messaging (whether or not a matching registration exists), this records the provided count of how many messages were simultaneously deleted, or zero if the count is unknown.

histogram.name: GCM.DeliveredToAppHandler
histogram.summary: Whether a received GCM message could be delivered to an app handler. Recorded for each received GCM message that didn't have encryption issues.

histogram.name: GCM.HeartbeatMissedDelta
histogram.summary: If a heartbeat was missed, the time delta by which it was missed (in system time, not ticks).

histogram.name: GCM.IncomingSendErrors
histogram.summary: Number of SEND_ERROR messages received from Google Cloud Messaging. Recorded when processing the received message.

histogram.name: GCM.LoadStatus
histogram.summary: Status code of loading from the persistent GCM store.

histogram.name: GCM.NumThrottledApps
histogram.summary: Number of applications hitting GCM per-app outstanding message limits at startup time.

histogram.name: GCM.PendingConnectionEventsAtShutdown
histogram.summary: Number of connection events which have not been sent to GCM. This is recorded only at the time of shutdown to capture the events which are being lost due to shutdown. Because this is recorded at shutdown, this is not guaranteed to be complete and should be treated as a best effort record.

histogram.name: GCM.RegistrationCacheStatus
histogram.summary: Reports the status of cached GCM registration. This is recorded when a new registration request is considered on the GCM client.

histogram.name: GCM.RegistrationRequest
histogram.summary: Number of registration requests sent to Google Cloud Messaging. Recorded immediately after the request has started.

histogram.name: GCM.RegistrationRequest.NetErrorCode
histogram.summary: Net error code from a GCM registration attempt. Recorded when URL loading completes.

histogram.name: GCM.RegistrationRequestStatus
histogram.summary: Status code of the outcome of a GCM registration request. The Unknown error case was split up in M56 (merged mid-beta to M55) to separate out the Response parsing failed, Internal server error, Quota exceeded, and Device has too many registrations cases.

histogram.name: GCM.RemoveAccountMappingWhenLoading
histogram.summary: Number of times that account mapping entries are deleted from or kept in the GCM store database while loading them in memory. Used during the account ID migration from email to Gaia ID.

histogram.name: GCM.ResetStoreError
histogram.summary: Reports the problem encountered when resetting the GCM store.

histogram.name: GCM.RestoredIncomingMessages
histogram.summary: Number of unacknowledged incoming messages restored from the persistent store at startup.

histogram.name: GCM.RestoredOutgoingMessages
histogram.summary: Number of pending outgoing messages restored from the persistent store at startup.

histogram.name: GCM.RestoredRegistrations
histogram.summary: Number of registrations restored from the persistent store at startup.

histogram.name: GCM.SendMessageStatus
histogram.summary: Result of sending an upstream message through Google Cloud Messaging. Recorded when the message has either been queued, sent, or has been dropped because it expired or an error happened.

histogram.name: GCM.SendWebPushMessagePayloadSize
histogram.summary: Size of web push messages payload. Recorded right before the message is sent.

histogram.name: GCM.SendWebPushMessageResult
histogram.summary: Result of sending web push messages. Recorded when the message has either been sent, or has been dropped because an error happened.

histogram.name: GCM.SendWebPushMessageStatusCode
histogram.summary: Result code from sending web push messages. Logs net::Error if it's not net::OK. Logs net::OK if response header is not present. Otherwise, logs HTTP status code returned. Recorded when received response after message has been sent.

histogram.name: GCM.StoreDestroySucceeded
histogram.summary: Success indicates successfully destroying the GCM persistent store. Failure indicates a failure destroying the persistence store. GCM store will be destroyed when the profile has been signed out.

histogram.name: GCM.StoreSizeKB
histogram.summary: Size of the GCM persistent store in kilobytes at startup. Warning: this histogram was expired from 2018-08-30 to 2021-09-20; data may be missing.

histogram.name: GCM.StoreUpdateSucceeded
histogram.summary: Success indicates successfully updating the GCM persistent store on message update. Failure indicates a failure updating the persistence store.

histogram.name: GCM.SuspendTime
histogram.summary: Time elapsed from machine suspend until resume.

histogram.name: GCM.UnregistrationRequestStatus
histogram.summary: Status code of the outcome of a GCM unregistration request.

histogram.name: GCM.UserSignedIn
histogram.summary: Indicates whether the user was signed in when GCM started up.

histogram.name: GCM.WebPushReceived.DeviceState
histogram.summary: Device state when receiving a web push message. Indicates if the message was sent with a high priority and if the device was in idle mode. Recorded when a web push message got received.
